The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 January is 2,190,702 (3,892 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 December, there were 240,074 new confirmed cases (426.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 December, there were 200,663 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (39,411 extra cases).
